articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture here Monday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.  
					Present at the meeting were senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and working people in the city. 
					
					General of the KPA Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, said in a report at the meeting:
					
					Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960). This was a clear manifestation of his fixed faith and will to accomplish with arms the Korean revolution which was started and made progress with arms.
					
					Kim Jong Il embarked upon the road of Songun revolutionary leadership, marking the beginning of the great history of successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's Songun idea and leadership and bringing about a new turning point in developing the revolutionary armed forces and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					His nearly half a century-long history of Songun revolutionary leadership is not only a shining course in which he has developed the People's Army into invincible revolutionary armed forces but a brilliant history shining with victories and glory in which he has firmly protected the destiny of the country, the nation and socialism thanks to a powerful military guarantee and made a new great history of building a rich and powerful country.  
					
					Under the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il a great advance has been made in the work to put all the people under arms and fortify the whole country and the army and people of the DPRK have made spectacular achievements glorifying the era of the Workers' Party in the crucible of the great revolutionary advance despite the repeated military provocations of the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					Kim Jong Il's extraordinary leadership sweep and distinguished political and military caliber were more clearly demonstrated in the facts that he ushered in the era of Songun, a new era of the Juche-oriented revolution, holding aloft the banner of Songun, thereby saving the destiny of the country and the nation when they stood at the crossroads of life or death and providing a solid guarantee for the victorious advance of the socialist cause and the building of a rich and powerful country. 
					
					He has wisely led the People's Army to form a harmonious whole in which it shares the idea, will and destiny with its Supreme Commander and made sure that the army and people achieved perfect unity in thinking and fighting traits. This helped the whole army form a harmonious whole with the leader and turned the country into one big family in which the army and people are linked with blood ties. 
					
					Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, genuine patriotic politics and anti-imperialist independent politics, a historic turn has taken place in the struggle for achieving national reunification, guided by the idea of "By our nation itself" and international solidarity with the Korean revolution has grown stronger and the DPRK's international prestige and influence have risen remarkably.   
					
					The reporter underscored the need for all the servicepersons and people to firmly defend Kim Jong Il politically and ideologically at the risk of their lives and consolidate as firm as a rock the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks with the headquarters of the revolution as the core. 
					
					Songun represents the dignity and sovereignty of the country and nation and it is the unshakable will of the Party to build a thriving nation with the might of Songun, the reporter noted, calling upon all the servicepersons and people to unite close around Kim Jong Il and wage a more dynamic struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, achieve the independent reunification of the country and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche through an intensified drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Ukraine
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Ukraine
 Pyongyang August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Viktor Yusenko, President of Ukraine, on its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the DPRK and Ukraine would favorably develop in mutual interests, Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the country's stability and the people's welfare.

articles.title: CILRECO Delegation Here
articles.content:
CILRECO Delegation Here
Pyongyang August 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea led by honorary Chairman Robert Charvin arrived in Pyongyang on Monday by air.

articles.title: Polish Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Polish Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A Polish photo exhibition was opened Monday at the Pyongyang International Cultural Center.
					 Attending its opening ceremony were Ryu Sung Rim, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Poland Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang and Charge d'Affaires ad Interim Tomasz Szczepanowski and staff members of the Polish embassy here.
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A similar event took place in Wonsan, too.

articles.title: Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Staff Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visit Korean Revolution Museum
 Pyongyang August 24 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, and its staff members visited the Korean Revolution Museum on Monday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the foundation of the AINDF.
					 Being briefed on the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il for national reunification and the nation-wide struggle for reunification, they went round photos and materials on display.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the chief wrote in the visitor's book that the great exploits performed by
						 Kim Il Sung for the reunification of the country all his life would shine forever.
					
					 True to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, a lodestar of national reunification, we vanguard fighters of the AINDF will wage a more dynamic struggle for independence, democracy and reunification in the van of the people of south Korea, he stressed.

articles.title: New Designs of Women's Clothes
articles.content:
New Designs of Women's Clothes
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The garment institute of the DPRK is striving to design and disseminate women's clothes of Korean style suitable to their aesthetic sense.
					 It has made a multimedia showing designs of seasonal women's clothes for tailor's shops across the country.
					
					 Put into the multimedia are more than 200 designs of women's clothes including traditional holiday and wedding dresses and daily clothes.
					
					 Shortcomings of the past seasonal clothes were rectified and new styles introduced in the new clothes.
					
					 The seasonal clothes were also designed to suit body shape, age and hobby of women.
					
					 The wedding dresses, gracefully white and light pink , are embroidered with gentle patterns. And the holiday dresses were decorated with patterns of deep and soft colors which are deep in national taste.
					
					 The colors of the jogori (coat) and chima (skirt) for middle-aged women are different and the harmony of colors further refined. The dresses for the aged are made elegantly with knitted cloth.
					
					 The clothes will be presented to the 7th National Korean Costume Exhibition.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Successes in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Successes in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians of the DPRK have of late solved lots of scientific and technological problems to make a positive contribution to the building of a great, prosperous and powerful nation. 
					Those of the Chollima Steel Complex renewed the refractory-laying method while producing refractory bricks to be used in purification furnace by itself, thus extending the serviceable life of the furnace from 2-3 times to more than 5 times compared with the previous one.  
					
					The Posan Iron Works increased the serviceable life of the revolving furnace three times by putting its operation on a scientific basis as against the pre-scientification and remarkably raised the efficiency of dust collection by improving the dust collection system. It is now striving to introduce a furnace-body blower into revolving furnace No. 2.
					
					Those of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex are directing much effort to applying a new rational ignition technology to the Juche-iron production process.
					
					The Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex and the railway bureaus of the country have opened a bright vista for completing at an early date important researches needed to develop a new kind of electric locomotive, increase rolling-stock production and putting railway traffic control system on a modern basis.
					
					The Hochongang Power Station succeeded in the die casting of the water turbine bucket at the first go-off which had been done after five or six trials. Power bases across the country including the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex introduced the technology of lowering the flame center and the remote fire observation system in all the boilers and renovated the generating facilities.
					
					The Tanchon District General Mining Bureau applied several highly efficient ring-shape excavating frames and a new kind of rock-drills to cutting faces of the Roun Mine and the Namphung Mine under the Komdok Mining Complex.
					
					The Rakwon Machine Complex is pushing ahead with the project for manufacturing oxygen plants of various capacities.
					
					The Taean Heavy Machine Complex, basing itself on the experience gained in developing and introducing the digital water turbine bucket processing lathe, has set forth a bold goal to digitalize various kinds of large-sized facilities.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists Condemned for Blowing up Ship
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists Condemned for Blowing up Ship
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists sank ship "Ukishima-maru" by blowing it up on August 24, 1945. This was a deliberate massacre committed by them, pursuant to their policy for exterminating the Korean nation. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					The criminal nature of the incident and truth about it were brought to light by the whole course from the moment an order was issued to "Ukishima-maru" to "sail towards Pusan" to the tragic end of the ship, testimonies made by survivors of the incident and information obtained through the survey and discovery made so far.
					
					 It was sheer sophism for the Japanese reactionaries to have claimed that the ship was sunken "by a mine".
					
					 The ship met such a tragic end because the Japanese imperialists carefully worked out in advance a plan for sending the ship with a large number of Koreans aboard to the bottom of the sea and put it into practice. The above-said claim made by the Japanese reactionaries was no more than a deceptive artifice to hide the criminal nature of the incident and the massacre of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The Korean people can never forget the above-mentioned day the Japanese imperialists massacred Koreans through such hideous operation even after their defeat. They, at the same time, keep on strict tabs all the mass killings of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists, while pursuing a harsh policy of military occupation of Korea after turning it into a colony. 
					
					 It is the unshakable resolution and will of the Korean people to surely settle accounts with Japan for its past crimes.

articles.title: UFG Termed Test Nuclear War against DPRK
articles.content:
UFG Termed Test Nuclear War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers are a test nuclear war against the DPRK to all intents and purposes and reckless saber rattling of the U.S. bellicose forces to invent a pretext for igniting a new war by driving the military confrontation and tension in the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are staging the UFG under a more dangerous new plan for joint operations against the DPRK which replaced "OPLAN 5027". This goes to clearly prove that their plan for the second Korean war is being put in a concrete shape, examined and rounded off in practice.
					
					 The U.S. bellicose forces are staging the UFG in collusion with the war servants of south Korea defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK and strong public protest and denunciation at home and abroad. This indicates that the U.S. policy for stifling the DPRK by force of arms remains unchanged even under the present U.S. administration.
					
					 The U.S. is frantically staging the above-said reckless preliminary nuclear war, pursuant to the new plan for joint operations for invading the DPRK, while stepping up the "operation for strangling" the DPRK through international "sanctions". This cannot be construed otherwise than a dangerous development. 
					
					 Through the UFG the U.S. once again stripped bare its true colors as a nuclear war maniac, the country negating dialogue and disturber of peace.
					
					 It is still misjudging the will and strength of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the toughest mode of counteraction of the DPRK to react to the enemy's stick with a sword and its artillery piece with a missile.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists would be well advised to stop acting rashly, clearly understanding the will of the DPRK to make strong retaliation and its powerful strength.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Celebrated
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings and a reading session took place in Guinea and Peru between August 13 and 16 on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Banou Keita, chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association, noted in his lecture that President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, put forward the democratic line suited to the Korean people's will and their thought and feelings after liberating the country from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					On Sept. 9, 1948, the DPRK was founded on the basis of the successes achieved through democratic reforms, the lecturer said, adding: Democracy in the DPRK developed into the socialist democracy, the democracy centered on the popular masses whereby all the working people help and lead each other forward with equal freedom and rights as the same members of the society.
					
					Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, noted at the reading session that the Korean people have turned out to bring about a new great revolutionary surge and surely open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 marking the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					Yuri Castro Romero, secretary general of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, in his lecture referred to the strength of Songun Korea, fully displayed through the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 in April, and to the sinister smear campaign conducted by the United States and its followers against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch.
					
					Saying that the DPRK manufactured the satellite with its own efforts and technology 100 percent despite the U.S. and other hostile forces' moves to stifle it, he stressed that the satellite launch of the DPRK, which demonstrated its high scientific and technological level and economic potentials, proves that a thriving nation, the goal of the Korean people, will be surely built in the near future.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Observed
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Observed
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued bulletins on August 17 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					The bulletin titled "Songun Politics Is Example of Independent Politics" said that socialist Korea regards independence of the country and the nation as its life and soul and resolutely defends it as it is guided by the Juche idea.
					
					It went on to say:
					
					The Songun politics, which has been applied in the DPRK and won the great sympathy from the world progressive people, is the most just socialist mode of politics that makes it possible to realize independence of the popular masses and achieve prosperity and development by their own efforts.
					
					The vitality of the Songun politics has been fully displayed through the reality of the DPRK.
					
					Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, has developed and enriched the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung in keeping with the present reality.
					
					Thanks to the Songun politics the WPK could frustrate every move of the imperialist allied forces and triumphantly advance the socialist cause.
					
					The bulletin entitled "Songun Politics and Korean-style Socialism" stressed that Songun is the secret whereby Korean socialism has won only victory and glory.
					
					The Songun politics is an almighty treasured sword which helped the Korean people to win in the confrontation with the imperialists and a strong weapon for building a great prosperous and powerful nation, it said, adding:
					
					Korean-style socialism will always emerge victorious under the Songun politics.

articles.title: President Who Acquainted Himself with Road Conditions
articles.content:
President Who Acquainted Himself with Road Conditions
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung visited a chicken farm in March of Juche 60 (1971).
					 He got off the car and stamped his feet on the road and pressed it with his fingers.
					
					 As for the road, it was paved around the coldest period of the winter at the final stage of the farm construction.
					
					 After a while he said with a beaming smile that he had worried whether the paved road was frozen but he was glad to see the road unfrozen.
					
					 Deeply moved by his loving care, the officials looked up to the President who had worried for two months whether eggs to be supplied to the people would be broken while transporting them for a bad road condition.

articles.title: Acto central por 49o aniversario del inicio de direccion del Songun
articles.content:
Acto central por 49o aniversario del inicio de direccion del Songun
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo de cumplirse los 49 anos desde que el Dirigente      Kim Jong Il dio el primer paso de su direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun (priorizacion militar), tuvo lugar este lunes en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por esa efemeride.
					En la ocasion participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de los partidos amigos, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las organizaciones sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), los funcionarios de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, asi como los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizo el 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche esa sagrada visita de orientacion a la Division de Tanques No. 105 Ryu Kyong Su "Seul Vanguardia" del EPC, recordo el orador y continuo:
					
					Esto significo la declaracion de su ferrea conviccion y voluntad de llevar a feliz termino con las fuerzas armadas la revolucion coreana iniciada y avanzada con las mismas.
					
					Gracias a este evento, comenzo la gran historia para continuar la idea y la direccion del Songun del Presidente Kim Il Sung y se abrio el nuevo periodo trascendental en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					La historia de cerca de medio siglo de la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun por el Dirigente es la orgullosa trayectoria en que el desarrollo el EPC como invencibles fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y los anales coronados de triunfos y glorias en que el ha venido salvaguardando el destino de la patria, la nacion y el socialismo y escribiendo la nueva y majestuosa historia de la construccion de una patria prospera con la firme garantia militar.
					
					Bajo la destacada guia del Dirigente, se logro un gran avance en las labores para el armamento de todo el pueblo y la fortificacion de todo el pais y el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pudieron lograr brillantes exitos, que glorifican la epoca del PTC, en su gran marcha revolucionaria frustrando las reiteradas provocaciones militares de los imperialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					La extraordinaria habilidad directiva y especial capacidad politico-militar del Dirigente se manifestaron contundentemente en que el salvo el destino de la patria y la nacion, que se hallaba en la disyuntiva de vida o muerte, y preparo la firme garantia del avance victorioso de la causa socialista y la construccion de una patria prospera al dar inicio bajo la bandera del Songun a la nueva era de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun.
					
					El Dirigente hizo del ejercito popular un ente unido de cuerpo y alma, que comparte la misma idea, el mismo proposito y el mismo destino con su Comandante Supremo, e implantar con firmeza la unanimidad de la idea y el estilo de lucha entre el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					Gracias a esta direccion, todo el ejercito se unio monoliticamente con su lider y formo parte de la familia junto con el pueblo, con que esta unido con lazos sanguineos.
					
					Gracias a la politica de Songun del Dirigente, patriotica de verdad y matizada por la independencia antiimperialista, se logro un viraje historico en la lucha por lograr la reunificacion de la patria bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", se fortalecio mas la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana y se elevaron extraordinariamente el prestigio e influencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la arena internacional.
					
					Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben defender en lo politico-ideologico y a costa de la vida al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y consolidar la unidad monolitica de las filas revolucionarias, cuyo nucleo es la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					El Songun es la dignidad y la soberania del pais y la nacion y levantar con su poderio una gran potencia prospera es la firme voluntad del PTC.
					
					Todos, unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente, deben luchar con mas firmeza por construir una gran potencia prospera socialista, reunificar la patria de manera independiente y coronar la causa revolucionaria del Juche redoblando el afan por producir un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario.

articles.title: Cuadros ven drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon"
articles.content:
Cuadros ven drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon"
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de los partidos amigos y los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, las organizaciones de masas, los ministerios y los organos centrales presenciaron el dia 23 en el Teatro de Arte Mansudae el drama "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon".
					 Los creadores y artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional readaptaron magnificamente ese drama al estilo coreano y a la altura del nuevo siglo demostrando el aspecto orgulloso de la dramaturgia coreana.
					
					 Al describir vividamente la vida de los soldados de una unidad del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China encargada de la guardia de la recien liberada ciudad de Shanghai, los ejecutantes mostraron como el militar con fusil en la mano debe defender a si mismo y las trincheras de la revolucion sin dejarse distraer por la rimbombante lampara de neon.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de CIERECO
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de CIERECO
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ATCC) -- Llego el dia 24 a esta capital por via aerea la delegacion del Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Paz de Corea encabezada por el presidente honorario Robert Charvin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela explosion del barco "Ukishima maru" por Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela explosion del barco "Ukishima maru" por Japon
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ATCC) -- El 24 de agosto de 1945 los imperialistas japoneses explotaron el barco "Ukishima maru". Esta masacre intencional fue la continuacion de la politica japonesa de exterminio a la nacion coreana.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 24 y continua:
					
					Hay muchos testimonios que revelan la intencion y caracter criminales de este incidente: todo el proceso del caso de "Ukishima maru" desde cuando se le dio orden de navegacion a Pusan, los testigos de las victimas sobrevivientes y los datos descubiertos hasta la fecha. 
					
					El caso del barco "Ukishima maru" lo inventaron los imperialistas japoneses segun su plan intencional, trazado detalladamente, con el fin de sepultar en el agua a los incontables coreanos junto con el barco. 
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses dicen que el "Ukishima maru"  fue  hundido "por las minas", lo que no pasa de ser una  artimana astuta para encubrir la esencia del caso y su crimen de exterminio masivo a los coreanos. 
					
					El pueblo coreano no olvida ese dia en que los imperialistas japoneses sepultaron en el mar a los coreanos, sino guarda en la mente todos los crimenes que ese pais isleno cometio contra los coreanos practicando en Corea la politica de ocupacion militar colonial. 
					
					Saldar sin falta cuenta final de los crimenes de Japon cometidos en el pasado es la invariable decision y voluntad del pueblo coreano.
